content.query:
let base = requests
| where cloud_RoleName startswith("func-functionhost-charges-")
| where operation_Name != "HealthCheck"
| summarize 
    time_taken = max(timestamp) - min(timestamp),
    operations = make_set(operation_Name, 10),
    _time = min(timestamp)
    by operation_Id
| where (operations contains "ChargeIngestion" 
    and operations contains "ChargeRejectionDataAvailableNotifierEndpoint")
    or
    (operations contains "ChargeIngestion"
    and operations contains "ChargeConfirmationDataAvailableNotifierEndpoint" 
    and operations contains "ChargeIntegrationEventsPublisherEndpoint" 
    and operations contains "ChargeDataAvailableNotifierEndpoint");
let history = base
| make-series   sliTrend = todecimal(count()) / countif(time_taken < timespan(300s))
                      on _time 
                from {period_dropdown:start} 
                to {period_dropdown:end} 
                step {period_dropdown:grain} 
| extend key="joinQuery";
base
| summarize 
    total_count = count(),
    count_ok = countif(time_taken < timespan(300s))
| extend sli = round(todecimal(count_ok) / total_count * 100, 2)
| extend details = strcat("Total: ", tostring(total_count), " OK: ", tostring(count_ok))
| extend header = "Latency"
| extend key = "joinQuery"
| join (history) on key
| project-away key1, key
